trans-unit.source: Specifies the painting style applied to multiple <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> objects contained in a form.

The ToolStripManagerRenderMode is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> class and sets the painting style for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects that have their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RenderMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode?displayProperty=fullName>.

You cannot explicitly set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RenderMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to Custom, however the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RenderMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is returned Custom when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Renderer%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set to an extension of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class that is not <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>.

Indicates the use of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer"></xref> other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer"></xref>.
Indicates the use of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer"></xref> to paint.
Indicates the use of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer"></xref> to paint.
